mapper.insert: insert into study (sno, id, sname, title, content, mname, location, totime, fromtime) values (#{sno}, #{id}, #{sname}, #{title}, #{content}, #{mname}, #{location}, #{totime}, #{fromtime})
insert into studymember (sno, name, id, gdate) values (#{sno}, #{name}, #{id}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select sno, sname, title, content, mname, id, location, totime, fromtime from study order by sname
select count(*) from studymember where id = #{id}
